name: Flatland Vol.2
description:
FLATLAND - Vol. 2 is a fast-paced hardcore platformer featuring hand-crafted levels and Lightning-fast respawns. Help Square in crossing the most dangerous part of Flatland: the flooded wells.

Key features:

- Controls are simple and accessible but with several layers of depth to master;
- A lot of itens to collect and new game modes to unlock;
- Lightning-fast respawns keep you in the flow even in more difficult levels;
- Challenging, fast and fun gameplay.

Run, jump, die, learn, repeat.
